definition: Carmen (name)/Carmen, 1875 opera by Georges Bizet 比才 based on novel by Prosper Mérimée 梅里美[Mei2 li3 mei3]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Tutankhamen, king of ancient Egypt 1333-1323 BC

sentences.english: Carmen is a teddy bear that Ashley had received as a gift when she was in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 卡门是一只泰迪熊，是艾诗丽住院期间收到的礼物。

sentences.english: Left alone with him, she entices José with suggestions of a rendezvous that night.
sentences.chinese: 在与贺塞独处时，卡门诱惑贺塞在晚上与她幽会。

sentences.english: The results from this equation of Karman constant agree with measured data.
sentences.chinese: 该卡门常数的理论公式与实测资料较为吻合。

sentences.english: Act II At the tavern, Zuniga tells Carmen that José has just been released.
sentences.chinese: 第二幕祖尼卡在酒馆告诉卡门，贺塞已获释。

sentences.english: Thus, the study of the duet in Carmen has a special significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究歌剧《卡门》的重唱将有其特殊的意义。

sentences.english: She was magnificent in Act One of `Carmen'.
sentences.chinese: 她在《卡门》的第一幕中演得好极了。

sentences.english: Inside the theatre, they were giving a performance of Bizet's Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 剧院里他们正在演出比才的歌剧《卡门》。

sentences.english: Carmen and "Chloe" of "LSG" and Exhibition Prague 2.
sentences.chinese: 卡门和克洛从整笔拨款模式与画廊布拉格会议2。

sentences.english: Carmen becomes tired of Don Jose and falls in love with the handsome matador Escamillo.
sentences.chinese: 卡门逐渐厌弃唐豪塞而爱上了斗牛士埃斯卡米里奥。

sentences.english: Carmen throws a flower at him, and the girls go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 卡门将鲜花抛给贺塞，而众女工重返工作岗位。

sentences.english: The tenor was singing the "toreador song" from carmen.
sentences.chinese: 男高音歌手正在唱《卡门》中的“斗牛士之歌”。

sentences.english: He tells José that he has come to find Carmen, and the two men fight.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉贺塞，他是为了找卡门而来，两人扭打在一起。

sentences.english: Relax at one of these great Playa del Carmen hotels.
sentences.chinese: 在普拉亚戴尔卡门的酒店好好放松吧。

sentences.english: At that point in her story, Carmen shook her head.
sentences.chinese: 故事讲到这里时，卡门摇摇头。

sentences.english: Exception was made only for the Roman Carmen, well-known author of pre-war documentaries.
sentences.chinese: 而唯一可以破例的是战前的著名作家，罗曼卡门。

definition: a dandy/a fop/Don Juan/a ladies man
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
